Job Title: Warehouse Utility

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Division: Atlanta

Department : College Park Production Warehouse Team 3

Work Schedule: Monday - Friday 9:00PM - 5:00AM (Weekends Overtime)

From $36,462 Annually

Why you will love Coca-Cola UNITED?

About Us

Privately owned and operated with 100+ years of historical strength and stabilityDedicated to supporting internal career growth through on job training, learning and opportunity for career advancementExcellent Total Value Benefits Package to include:Two weeks paid vacation within first yearComprehensive Medical Preferred Provider Plan ($35 physical copay; $15 Teladoc copay)Dental, vision, flex spendingEmployee Assistance ProgramCompany paid life insurance ($50,000)Additional optional insurance (accident, critical illness, universal life, home & auto)Paid maternity & paternity leavePaid holiday & sick time401(k) match (50% on first 6%; plus an additional annual match of up to 3%)Exclusive employee discounts (cell phone, event tickets, gym membership, car buying, hotels, car rentals, technology needs and much more)Competitive Compensation Fast paced environment promotes a healthy lifestyleFor qualified candidates we offer an amazing CDL Tuition Program reimbursable up to $5250 for CDL school tuition â€“ ask your Recruiter for details 

Job Description

Assist or perform other positions in the warehouse to include forklift, material handler, clerk positions. Keep facility clean and orderly including shipping, warehouse, and outside grounds by performing the following duties. Assist shift supervisor and/or lead in the areas of shipping, loading, receiving, warehouse storage, product rotation, inventory accuracy, productivity, quality, and safety

What Your Day Will Look Like

Assist or perform Material Handler, Forklift operator, Clerk, building & grounds dutiesSupport warehouse lead duties, release shipments, dock coordinator and check loaded palletsSupport inventory and warehouse clerk duties, inventory count reconciliation, process shipments and create Purchase Orders /Stock Transfer OrderUnload inbound shipments, load Direct Store Delivery trucks and put away and replenishment of productBuild pallets via paper order or Voice pickRework damaged product in warehouseSort product and replenish flow racksRestack fallen productStraighten and sort pallets and shellsPerform general housekeeping dutiesOperate efficiently to increase productivity while maintaining an excellent level of safety and quality in the workplacePerforms appropriate duties as assigned by management

What You Need To Succeed

Minimum age 18 years oldPersonal Protective Equipment (PPE) as required by position and compliance with UNITED safety policiesRegular and prompt attendance is an essential function of the jobAbility to read, write and speak EnglishAbility to maintain a neat professional appearance within Company guidelinesAbility to maintain safety and security of Company assetsAbility to utilize all Company provided resources and technologyHigh school diploma or general education degree (GED); or 6 to 12 months related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experienceRepeated walking, standing and exposure to weatherAbility to demonstrate initiative and teamworkWillingness to work weekends, holidays, or flexible schedule as required

CCBCU is an Equal Opportunity Employer Minorities/Women/Veterans/Disabled. Veteran friendly.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Maintain an excellent level of safety and quality

Fast paced environment promotes a healthy lifestyle
